member.name: P:ArkSavegameToolkitNet.Domain.ArkCreature.BaseStats
member.summary:
0 - health
1 - stamina
2 - torpor
3 - oxygen
4 - food
5 - water
6 - temperature
7 - weight
8 - melee damage
9 - movement speed
10 - fortitude
11 - crafting speed

member.name: M:ArkSavegameToolkitNet.Domain.ArkGameData.Update(System.Threading.CancellationToken,ArkSavegameToolkitNet.Domain.ArkPlayerExternal[],System.Boolean,ArkSavegameToolkitNet.Domain.ArkAnonymizeData)
member.param: Supply the update operation with external player data. This is a way to make sure transfered players are not lost inbetween saves.
